price: चाहे उनके पास हर निशानी आ जाए, यहाँ तक कि वे दर्दनाक अज़ाब देख लें।
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
